content: Keep the soil evenly moist for the healthiest growth. If the sun gets too hot, Chinese cabbage tends to bolt or go to seed; in long periods of heat, some kind of shade may be helpful.
200+ Canton Pak Choi Bok Choy Chinese Cabbage Seeds Heirloom Non GMO Productive Brassica rapa VAR. chinensis, a.k.a. Cantons Choice, Bok Choi, from USA
